entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support relative URIs for images #8667
  • Avoid the need for custom MarkupExtension to load embedded images #8666
  • ListView context menu on MacCatalyst doesn't show up at all #8664
  • SVGs not showing on iOS #8663
  • Replace image comparison with Verify #8661
  • MAUI Windows Implementation - When Picker Is Opened It Defaults To Middle Of List Instead Of Start Of List. #8658
  • MAUI Solution asking for Workloads when they are all installed. #8657
  • Maui - Stepper do not turn enabled #8656
  • Restore nuget packages fails on Maui projects #8655
  • APT2000 El sistema no puede encontrar el archivo especificado. (2). file:///C:/Program%20Files/dotnet/packs/Microsoft.Android.Sdk.Windows/32.0.300-rc #8654
  • WebView hyperlink click navigation doesn't contain clicked URL on Android #8648
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] Gestures does not work on elements initially outside of the view port of the ScrollView #8647
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] ScrollView is not longer visualised when placed inside VerticalStackLayout #8645
  • Entry keyboard 'Custom' #8644
  • [MacCatalyst] ScrollView does not arrange accurately on window resize #8643
  • White screen when changing the main screen #8642
  • Style OnIdiom not working for Tablet & Desktop #8641
  • Entitlements.plist for MacCatalyst #8640
  • Android emulation not working on Mac - error XA0010: Could not retrieve the Android ABI for the attached device or emulator. #8639

Closed

  • Windows: Command ChangeCanExecute does not re-enable a disabled button #7690
  • [Android] IsVisible property change won't work as expected via MVVM #8445
    6.0-sr3
  • Bug: Styling for Border Control is not working #8625
    6.0-servicing
  • Hot Reload is a Hot Mess - Bring Back Designer Please #8610
  • Clearing Border.StrokeShape throws an exception #8479
    6.0-sr3
  • Border.IsVisible binding property changed event not work on Android. #8615

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ListView Context Menu show up in correct position on Windows #8665
    area/ListView, .NET 7
  • Ensure Flex items have updated values from FlexLayout children before layout #8660
  • Set Window Parent before initialize the child ContentPage #8653
    t/bug, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix crash in SwipeView collapsing ListView groups #8651
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22329.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22361.3 #8649
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Used platformView property for disconnect #8662
  • Fix DatePicker on iOS so that it can GC #8476
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add updated Tools paths #8600
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Shell] Fixes for Shell issues with iOS and Mac #8618
    area/shell 🐢, partner/macios
  • Propagate appearing/disappearing/deactivated #8542
    t/bug, area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Android more cores #8604
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! #8147
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • Fix CheckBox's VisualStates #8605
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-servicing
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr3
  • [xamlc] add compiled BrushTypeConverter #8567
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
